name: Mehran Karimzadeh
title: Photographer
bio: I am one of the photographers for Raw Poscast. I am also a PhD Candidate at Department of Medical Biophysics at UofT and also a post-graduate affiliate at Vector Institute. My research focuses on how our epigenome changes in cancer. Epigenome is the non-genetic aspect of DNA, such as its chemical modifications, its topology, and which proteins are bound to it. I use machine learning to model and study the epigenome.
